title: GCSE results (‘Attainment 8’)
description: This data measures how children perform in 8 GCSE-level qualifications, referred to by the Department for Education (DfE) as ‘Attainment 8’.
datasetNotes: On the landing page, click on 14. Download the data within the Contents section
notes:
The CSV files (national and local authority) look similar in dimension content and may be able to be combined into one dataset.
Source data for datasets derived from datasets on landing page https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/key-stage-4-and-multi-academy-trust-performance-2018-revised.
After discussion with DM (LP) decided to keep original landing page and use CSV files.
